item.title: Re: HC => Fws
item.description:
I will definitely miss this forum and community. I'm glad I met you people, HC//Fun was truly the beginning of my CS2D experience and I'm glad I was a part of it.

Thank you HC for an amazing gameplay experience. Your coding skills are amazing by the wa...

item.title: Re: HC => Fws
item.description: Thanks happy camper more than 3 years of moderating. I really feel sad to hear this. I still want to be a part of this map.

item.title: Re: HotChills.org will close on January 27
item.description:
Decided to visit the site to see what's going on, and what an awful coincidence.
Hello guys.
Truly sad to read the bad news.
Can someone please explain what led to this conclusion? Probably the lack of people on the server, i'm guessing.

Update: I've...

item.title: Re: HotChills.org will close on January 27
item.description:
Quote from: siN on November 28, 2017, 10:45:22
C'mon guys, quitting without even trying?
Shame

You've been here for not as long as I've. And I already have been in fws community.
